official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives in support of a prompt settlement of the national football league strike.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that all parties involved in the National Football League dispute should take the actions necessary to settle the strike promptly.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives in support of a prompt settlement of the national football league strike.
